name: Dibe Laba

projects.title: Delika Rider
projects.description: Rider-facing application or system within the Delika platform, a tech-enabled food delivery and logistics service.

projects.title: The Kwame Bofrot Foundation
projects.description: Centralized player database to support scouting, recruitment, and talent development efforts by documenting key information about young football players.

services.title: Product Strategy & Documentation
services.description:
Writing Product Requirement Documents (PRDs)
Creating user stories, use cases, and acceptance criteria
Structuring MVP roadmaps, sprint planning, and team deliverables

services.title: Full-Stack Development Support
services.description:
Backend logic using Firebase, Supabase
Frontend architecture using React, Vite, Next.js, TailwindCSS
API integration with platforms like MTN MoMo, WhatsApp Flows, Paystack

services.title: UX/UI Design Guidance
services.description:
Structuring wireframes and flows in Figma
Offering feedback and best practices for responsive, accessible design
Workflow optimization using Locofy, Expo, and design-to-code tools
